alert.note: Alert for Mobile (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 8:26PM CDT until August 05 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL MOBILE COUNTY... At 826 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles southwest of Mobile Regional Airport, or 7 miles west of Tillmans Corner, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Mobile Regional Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
